summary: This document is an email sent by Jeffrey Epstein to Jes Staley, dated March 1, 2011. The email contains an apology for typos and is noted to be confidential, with a request for confidential treatment by JPMorgan Chase.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is the sender of the email, addressing Jes Staley and apologizing for typos.

persons.name: Jes Staley
persons.context: Jes Staley is the recipient of the email from Jeffrey Epstein.

connections.description: Jeffrey Epstein and Jes Staley are connected through personal correspondence.

keyFacts: The email was sent on March 1, 2011.
Jeffrey Epstein apologized for typos in the email.
The email is marked as confidential and requests confidential treatment by JPMorgan Chase.
